name: Peach Salsa With Pickled Red Onions and Serrano Chilies
description: Quick-pickled red onions and sweet fresh peaches balance the heat of serrano chilies in this bold, tangy, vibrant mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring vinegar, sugar and 1 1/2 teaspoons salt to boil in saucepan, stirring to dissolve sugar and salt. Pour over onions in nonreactive bowl; let cool, then refrigerate at least 1 hour or overnight. Mix together peaches and peppers and sprinkle very lightly with salt. Drain onions and fold in; add small amount pickling liquid, if desired. Serve immediately, or refrigerate in airtight container for 1 to 2 hours and serve at room temperature.
